item.title: How to Express Emoji in Custom Hugo
item.description: It’s easy. # Setting enableEmoji=true into config.toml in root directory(not in theme’s config.toml file) add the parent tag where you want to express emoji, as the following below <body {{ emojify 1}}> References # https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41047920/adding-emoji-to-a-hugo-page-variable/41280669#41280669 https://www.webfx.com/tools/emoji-cheat-sheet/ https://gohugo.io/functions/emojify/
